underlying_goal: To simplify an over-engineered prompt selection methodology in a research paper.
primary_success: Successfully simplified a complex, two-stage filtering methodology in the paper to a more direct single-pass filter, aligning it with prior work and improving clarity.
brief_summary: The user requested to simplify the prompt filtering methodology described in the paper. The agent identified the complex two-stage process and replaced it with a simpler, single-pass filter based on a 10pp threshold from prior work, successfully compiling the document afterward.
